translations: 冒名顶替者；骗子（imposter 的复数）

sentences.sentence: And treat those two imposters just the same;
If you can meet with triumph and disaster and treat those too imposters just the same.
sentences.translation: 下附口你与成功和失败不期而遇，把二者皆视为骗子。

sentences.sentence: Kipling cautions his son to distrust both success (triumph) and failure (disaster) as imposters. He warns him both are deceptive.
sentences.translation: Kipling提醒他的儿子，不要相信成功或失败，它们都是靠不住的。
